title: Generative AI could have been an existential threat for Canva, which made billions by making graphic design quick and easy. But for CEO Melanie Perkins, itâ€™s simply making the world more visual.
content: Design platform Canva launched in 2013 with the aim of democratizing visual creation through features like templates and drag-and-drop graphics. The Sydney-headquartered company has grown to 220 million monthly active users and an 11-figure valuation. Cofounder and CEO Melanie Perkins insists she never saw AI as an existential threat and is excited to embrace it.
author: Victoria Turk
